remarks: If a function over the nonnegative integers is finitely supported, then there is an upper bound for the arguments resulting in nonzero values. (Contributed by AV, 6-Oct-2019.)
statement:
fsuppmapnn0ub $p |- ( ( F e. ( R ^m NN0 ) /\ Z e. V ) -> ( F finSupp Z -> E. m e. NN0 A. x e. NN0 ( m < x -> ( F ` x ) = Z ) ) ) $.
$d F m x $.
$d V x $.
$d Z m x $.
